tp:taxon-treatment.tp:nomenclature:
Nemastoma bidentatum schmidti
ssp. nov. ×
N. bidentatum sneznikensis
ssp. nov.

tp:treatment-sec.p: In typical male hybrids, Ch basal article oblong, sneznikensis -like, with Ch-Apo with small apical pinnacle posteriorly, Pa-Fe club-shaped, thinner than in N. b. schmidti ssp. nov., with three simple ventral spines in distal Pa-Fe half, Pa-Pt schmidti -like, Pa-Ti with inconspicuous tubercle.
To date, only one male has been found.
